column4: hey again, still can't get firefox to quit... how can I kill it?
roo_ , didn't work. still tells me default profile is in use, can't use it, so won't start
on a terminal put "ps ax | grep firefox"
u can edit the profiles.ini on the same direcroty
won't that delete my default profile? That's what I was trying to avoid, so I won't lose everything I configured
and set the correct profile for you
what u have on the profiles.ini ?
firefox still tells me default's in use
u bet :) i've been dual-booting with win and mandrake/red hat/knoppix... since i've ran into ubuntu, I just forgot about the dual boot
